a.text: Nope. Since the information actually left the facility, we have a real problem here.

b.text: Nope. We didn't identify the issue or fix the problem.

c.text: Correct! This would likely be a violation. Let's try another example.

config.title: Choose Wisely
config.subTitle: Someone just left the facility with a picture of our mapboard. If an auditor learned of this, what would happen?
